00037 #ifndef _UPCALL_CACHE_H
00038 #define _UPCALL_CACHE_H
00039 
00040 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00041 #include <lnet/types.h>
00042 
00048 #define UC_CACHE_NEW            0x01
00049 #define UC_CACHE_ACQUIRING      0x02
00050 #define UC_CACHE_INVALID        0x04
00051 #define UC_CACHE_EXPIRED        0x08
00052 
00053 #define UC_CACHE_IS_NEW(i)          ((i)->ue_flags & UC_CACHE_NEW)
00054 #define UC_CACHE_IS_INVALID(i)      ((i)->ue_flags & UC_CACHE_INVALID)
00055 #define UC_CACHE_IS_ACQUIRING(i)    ((i)->ue_flags & UC_CACHE_ACQUIRING)
00056 #define UC_CACHE_IS_EXPIRED(i)      ((i)->ue_flags & UC_CACHE_EXPIRED)
00057 #define UC_CACHE_IS_VALID(i)        ((i)->ue_flags == 0)
00058 
00059 #define UC_CACHE_SET_NEW(i)         ((i)->ue_flags |= UC_CACHE_NEW)
00060 #define UC_CACHE_SET_INVALID(i)     ((i)->ue_flags |= UC_CACHE_INVALID)
00061 #define UC_CACHE_SET_ACQUIRING(i)   ((i)->ue_flags |= UC_CACHE_ACQUIRING)
00062 #define UC_CACHE_SET_EXPIRED(i)     ((i)->ue_flags |= UC_CACHE_EXPIRED)
00063 #define UC_CACHE_SET_VALID(i)       ((i)->ue_flags = 0)
00064 
00065 #define UC_CACHE_CLEAR_NEW(i)       ((i)->ue_flags &= ~UC_CACHE_NEW)
00066 #define UC_CACHE_CLEAR_ACQUIRING(i) ((i)->ue_flags &= ~UC_CACHE_ACQUIRING)
00067 #define UC_CACHE_CLEAR_INVALID(i)   ((i)->ue_flags &= ~UC_CACHE_INVALID)
00068 #define UC_CACHE_CLEAR_EXPIRED(i)   ((i)->ue_flags &= ~UC_CACHE_EXPIRED)
00069 
00070 struct upcall_cache_entry;
00071 
00072 struct md_perm {
00073         lnet_nid_t      mp_nid;
00074         uint32_t        mp_perm;
00075 };
00076 
00077 struct md_identity {
00078         struct upcall_cache_entry *mi_uc_entry;
00079         uid_t                      mi_uid;
00080         gid_t                      mi_gid;
00081         struct group_info          *mi_ginfo;
00082         int                        mi_nperms;
00083         struct md_perm            *mi_perms;
00084 };
00085 
00086 struct upcall_cache_entry {
00087         struct list_head        ue_hash;
00088         uint64_t                ue_key;
00089         atomic_t                ue_refcount;
00090         int                     ue_flags;
00091         wait_queue_head_t       ue_waitq;
00092         cfs_time_t              ue_acquire_expire;
00093         cfs_time_t              ue_expire;
00094         union {
00095                 struct md_identity      identity;
00096         } u;
00097 };
00098 
00099 #define UC_CACHE_HASH_SIZE        (128)
00100 #define UC_CACHE_HASH_INDEX(id)   ((id) & (UC_CACHE_HASH_SIZE - 1))
00101 #define UC_CACHE_UPCALL_MAXPATH   (1024UL)
00102 
00103 struct upcall_cache;
00104 
00105 struct upcall_cache_ops {
00106         void            (*init_entry)(struct upcall_cache_entry *, void *args);
00107         void            (*free_entry)(struct upcall_cache *,
00108                                       struct upcall_cache_entry *);
00109         int             (*upcall_compare)(struct upcall_cache *,
00110                                           struct upcall_cache_entry *,
00111                                           __u64 key, void *args);
00112         int             (*downcall_compare)(struct upcall_cache *,
00113                                             struct upcall_cache_entry *,
00114                                             __u64 key, void *args);
00115         int             (*do_upcall)(struct upcall_cache *,
00116                                      struct upcall_cache_entry *);
00117         int             (*parse_downcall)(struct upcall_cache *,
00118                                           struct upcall_cache_entry *, void *);
00119 };
00120 
00121 struct upcall_cache {
00122         struct list_head        uc_hashtable[UC_CACHE_HASH_SIZE];
00123         spinlock_t              uc_lock;
00124         rwlock_t                uc_upcall_rwlock;
00125 
00126         char                    uc_name[40];            /* for upcall */
00127         char                    uc_upcall[UC_CACHE_UPCALL_MAXPATH];
00128         int                     uc_acquire_expire;      /* seconds */
00129         int                     uc_entry_expire;        /* seconds */
00130         struct upcall_cache_ops *uc_ops;
00131 };
00132 
00133 struct upcall_cache_entry *upcall_cache_get_entry(struct upcall_cache *cache,
00134                                                   __u64 key, void *args);
00135 void upcall_cache_put_entry(struct upcall_cache *cache,
00136                             struct upcall_cache_entry *entry);
00137 int upcall_cache_downcall(struct upcall_cache *cache, __u32 err, __u64 key,
00138                           void *args);
00139 void upcall_cache_flush(struct upcall_cache *cache, int force);
00140 
00141 static inline void upcall_cache_flush_idle(struct upcall_cache *cache)
00142 {
00143         upcall_cache_flush(cache, 0);
00144 }
00145 
00146 static inline void upcall_cache_flush_all(struct upcall_cache *cache)
00147 {
00148         upcall_cache_flush(cache, 1);
00149 }
00150 
00151 void upcall_cache_flush_one(struct upcall_cache *cache, __u64 key, void *args);
00152 struct upcall_cache *upcall_cache_init(const char *name, const char *upcall,
00153                                        struct upcall_cache_ops *ops);
00154 void upcall_cache_cleanup(struct upcall_cache *cache);
00155 
00158 #endif /* _UPCALL_CACHE_H */
